title: Cheesesteak sandwich with grilled onions
description: You won’t be tempted by a kebab once you've tried this perfect post-pub steak sandwich. Add mustard or chilli sauce if you need to clear your head.Follow @bbcfood on Instagram for more recipes like this.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
25g/1oz semi-soft cheese (such as port salut, taleggio or brie)
1 panini roll or demi-baguette, lightly toasted
